Package de.swa.fuh.mpeg7

Class Mpeg7Converter

java.lang.Object
de.swa.fuh.mpeg7.Mpeg7Converter
public class Mpeg7Converter
extends java.lang.Object
Author:
michaelhermann Class that imports MPEG7 XML Files to a MMFG File(s) and exports a MMFG FIle to a Default-MPEG7 File
